entities.name: wood
entities.description: Wood is described as a superb Keeper, indicating his role in the game. ("’Course, Wood’s a superb Keeper!")

entities.name: lee jordan
entities.description: Lee Jordan is described as providing commentary for the crowd, highlighting his role as a commentator. ("’Course, Wood’s a superb Keeper! Lee Jordan told the crowd...")

entities.name: madam hooch
entities.description: Madam Hooch is described as blowing her whistle to signal the start of play. ("Madam Hooch’s whistle rang out again...")

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as zooming away and gazing around for the Snitch, indicating his role in the game. ("Relieved, Harry zoomed away...")

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is described as someone that Harry needs to hold off from getting the Snitch. ("It was essential that he hold Malfoy oﬀ the Snitch...")

entities.name: katie bell
entities.description: Katie Bell is described as playing for Gryffindor and attempting to score with the Quaffle. ("Gryﬀindor back in possession... Katie Bell, Katie Bell for Gryﬀindor with the Quaﬄe...")

entities.name: montague
entities.description: Montague is described as a Slytherin Chaser who swerved in front of Katie Bell. ("Montague, a Slytherin Chaser, had swerved in front of Katie...")

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is described as the team that Wood is keeping for and that Harry needs to hold a lead over. ("’Course, Wood’s a superb Keeper! Gryﬀindor in possession...")

entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: Slytherin is described as the opposing team to Gryffindor. ("Gryﬀindor in possession, no, Slytherin in possession—no!—")

entities.name: snitch
entities.description: The Snitch is described as something that Harry needs to find and hold off Malfoy from getting. ("It was essential that he hold Malfoy oﬀ the Snitch...")

entities.name: quaﬄe
entities.description: The Quaffle is described as something that Katie Bell is attempting to score with. ("Katie Bell, Katie Bell for Gryﬀindor with the Quaﬄe...")

relationships.description: Wood is described as keeping for Gryffindor, indicating his role in the game. ("’Course, Wood’s a superb Keeper! Gryﬀindor in possession...")
Harry is described as needing to find the Snitch, indicating his role in the game. ("It was essential that he hold Malfoy oﬀ the Snitch...")
Malfoy is described as someone that Harry needs to hold off from getting the Snitch. ("It was essential that he hold Malfoy oﬀ the Snitch...")
Katie Bell is described as attempting to score with the Quaffle, indicating her role in the game. ("Gryﬀindor back in possession... Katie Bell, Katie Bell for Gryﬀindor with the Quaﬄe...")
Montague is described as swerving in front of Katie Bell, indicating his interference with her play. ("Montague, a Slytherin Chaser, had swerved in front of Katie...")
